title: Heidi Di Santo's guide to relaxation
brief_description: Heidi Di Santo teaches a relaxation technique to assist with combating stress in the workplace. Stress is something which affects the productivity of most workplaces, and this video offers suggestions on how to minimize the stress and increase productivity.
